snippet: Peter Praet said the bank would be taking a hard look at economic weakness at its next policy meeting, especially for signs that inflation expectations may be slipping.
lead_paragraph: Peter Praet said the bank would be taking a hard look at economic weakness at its next policy meeting, especially for signs that inflation expectations may be slipping.

headline.main: Eurozone Had No Room Left to Cut Rates, Economist Says
headline.print_headline: Eurozone Had No Room Left To Cut Rates, Economist Says
